primary.context: Caller immediately requested a human agent for billing
primary.detail: Caller requested a representative, waited through a long hold message, and then declined AI help when told no one was available.

steps: Agent warned of long wait times and asked if caller wanted to proceed.
Caller confirmed they wanted to wait and specified the billing department.
Agent played a long concierge hold message for approximately 20 minutes.
Agent interrupted hold message to state no representative was available and offered AI assistance for billing.
Caller declined AI assistance and the call ended.

actions.detail: Attempted transfer to billing; no representative available after long hold.

insights.summary: The caller requested a billing representative and waited through a 20-minute hold loop only to be told no one was available; they declined the AI's offer to help with billing and hung up.
insights.coaching: The agent correctly identified the out-of-scope request and attempted transfer, but the extremely long hold time followed by a 'no one available' message creates high friction.
